question: What types of products do you offer?
answer: We offer a wide variety of daily use products including personal care items, household cleaners, kitchen essentials, and eco-friendly options. Our selection includes liquid soaps, dishwashing liquids, microfiber cloths, reusable water bottles, and much more.

question: How do I place an order?
answer: You can place an order directly through our website. Browse our product categories, select the items you want, add them to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You'll need to provide shipping and payment information to complete the order.

question: What are your delivery options?
answer: We offer standard and expedited shipping options. Depending on your location, same-day or next-day delivery may also be available. Shipping options and estimated delivery times will be shown at checkout.

question: Do you offer international shipping?
answer: Currently, we only offer domestic shipping within the country. We are working to expand our delivery services internationally in the near future.

question: How do I keep household items like cleaning sprays and microfiber cloths in good condition?
answer: To maintain your cleaning products and cloths, store them in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Wash microfiber cloths regularly without fabric softener to preserve their cleaning efficiency.

question: Can I customize my order?
answer: We offer customization options for gift bundles and certain household sets. You can select preferred colors, sizes, or fragrances in some cases. Contact customer service for any special requests.

question: What if my product arrives damaged?
answer: If any item arrives damaged, please contact us within 24 hours of delivery. We offer replacements or refunds for damaged products under our satisfaction guarantee.

question: Do you offer subscription services?
answer: Yes, we offer subscription plans for regular deliveries of products like cleaning supplies, personal care items, and kitchen essentials. You can choose the frequency that best fits your needs.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and Google Pay. For larger corporate or bulk orders, we also provide invoicing options.

question: Can I include a personalized gift message with my order?
answer: Yes, you can include a personalized message with your order, especially if you are sending it as a gift. Simply add your message during checkout.

question: Do you offer eco-friendly or sustainable products?
answer: Yes, we prioritize eco-friendly and sustainable options, including biodegradable trash bags, reusable water bottles, and cleaning products made from natural ingredients.

answer: If you're not home during delivery, we will either leave your package in a secure location or attempt redelivery the next day, depending on your shipping preferences.

question: Do you offer bulk or corporate orders?
answer: Yes, we offer bulk ordering and corporate supply services. For more details and custom quotes, please contact our corporate sales team.

question: When should I place my order for large events or special occasions?
answer: For large orders or special events, we recommend placing your order at least 1-2 weeks in advance to ensure availability and on-time delivery.

question: Can I track my order?
answer: Yes, once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package's delivery status.

question: Do you offer product care tips?
answer: Yes, each product page includes care instructions to help you get the most out of your purchase. We also provide general care tips on our website.

question: What if the product I want is out of stock?
answer: If a product is out of stock, you can sign up for notifications on our website, and we will notify you once the product becomes available again.

question: Do you offer gift items or bundles?
answer: Yes, we offer a range of gift bundles and complementary items like reusable bags, eco-friendly cleaning kits, and personal care sets.

question: How do I choose the right product for my needs?
answer: We provide detailed descriptions and customer reviews on each product page to help you make an informed decision. Our customer support team is also available for personalized recommendations.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: For non-perishable items, we accept returns within 14 days of delivery. However, if you're unsatisfied with your order, please contact us within 24 hours of receiving it, and we'll work to resolve the issue.
